roleset.name: expunge objectionable material from text
roleset.note: EXPURGATE-V NOTES: Roleset for 'expurgate' based on usages found in Internet usage and expansion in parallel with VerbNet. VerbNet class 10.4.1. Comparison to 'expunge.' Roleset by Claire (from expurgate.01-v)

role.descr: Source, entity arg 1 is removed from

example.name: Adjectival Usage
example.text: Whoever says such things must have read a very heavily expurgated version of the Old Testament.

example.name: Transitive, with purpose
example.text: [The publisher]-1 decided *PRO*-1 to expurgate the love scene from the book to make it more child-friendly.
